document_data.name: Hyraken
document_data.mainbody: '''Hyraken''' was a noble house of [[Cormyr]] around [[1370 DR]]. It was based in the town of [[Hilp]]. <ref group="note">It is not altogether clear that "Hyraken" is actually a noble family of Cormyr. It is referred to only in the name of "Lord Hyraken" and in a single reference to "the Hyraken" in ''[[Into the Dragon's Lair]]'', page 20, upon which the supposition this is a noble house is based. Furthermore, Lord Hyraken is stated to hail from Hilp, but [[Doon Dzavar]] was previously established to be its local lord in other sources. It may be that the Hyrakens replaced the Dzavars, or are a much more minor family of Hilp, or that "Hyraken" is in fact a given name for a member of the Dzavars.
document_data.Members: * Lord [[Hyraken (lord)|Hyraken]], head of the house and leader of the [[Freedom Warriors]] trying to overthrow the Crown and a bloodthirsty megalomaniac.
